mapper.select: SELECT mr.year, mr.month, mp.mpredPower, mr.mrealPower, mr.userId, location.locName FROM monPredPower_tb as mp JOIN monRealPower_tb as mr ON mp.month = mr.month JOIN location_tb as location ON mp.bigRegion = location.bigRegion where mr.userId = #{userId} and location.locName = #{userLoc} and mp.year = mr.year;

SELECT dp.year, dp.month, dp.day, dp.dpredPower, dr.drealPower, dr.userId, dp.locCode FROM dayPredPower_tb as dp JOIN dayRealPower_tb as dr ON dp.day = dr.day JOIN location_tb as location ON dp.locCode = location.locCode where dr.userId = #{userId} and location.locName = #{userLoc} and dp.year = dr.year and dp.month = dr.month;

SELECT hp.year, hp.month, hp.day, hp.hour, hp.hpredPower, hr.hrealPower, hr.userId, hp.locCode FROM hourPredPower_tb as hp JOIN hourRealPower_tb as hr ON hp.hour = hr.hour JOIN location_tb as location ON hp.locCode = location.locCode where hr.userId = #{userId} and location.locName = #{userLoc} and hp.year = hr.year and hp.month = hr.month and hp.day = hr.day;

SELECT wf.year, wf.month, wf.day, wf.hour, wf.temperature, wf.humidity, wf.windDirection, wf.windSpeed, wf.cloud, location.locName FROM weatherFct_tb as wf JOIN location_tb as location ON wf.locCode = location.locCode WHERE location.locName = #{userLoc}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hourRealPower_tb(year, month, day, hour, hrealPower, userId) VALUES (#{year}, #{month}, #{day}, #{hour}, #{hRealPower}, #{userId})
INSERT INTO dayRealPower_tb(dRealId, year, month, day, drealPower, userId) VALUES (#{dRealId}, #{year}, #{month}, #{day}, #{dRealPower}, #{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE dayRealPower_tb set drealPower = drealPower + #{dRealPower} where dRealId = #{dRealId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO monRealPower_tb(mRealId, year, month, mrealPower, userId) VALUES (#{mRealId}, #{year}, #{month}, #{mRealPower}, #{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE monRealPower_tb set mrealPower = mrealPower + #{mRealPower} where mRealId = #{mRealId}
